Package es.usal.bicoverlapper.kernel.managers

Class Summary
ConfigurationListener MouseAdapter to listen to configuration requests under a Diagram
ConfigurationMenuManager Class that handles the Configuration Menu Options It contains a list of colors and characteristics of the Diagram, so we can change colors of different characteristics of the Diagram, as, for example, axes, selected entities, labels, etc.
FileMenuManager Class that handles the File Menu Options
HelpMenuManager This class manages Help Menu selections
ViewMenuManager Class that handles the View Menu Options
